name: Saint Patrick Homebanking
description: Web App that simulates an E-Wallet, focused on money transactions in multiple currencies and account information. Frontend: React, Webpack, Styled Components. Backend: NodeJS, Express, Json Web Token, MongoDB.

name: McDonald's App Clone
description: Progressive Web App emulating the style and functionality the native original app of McDonald's. This project was developed for an assignment at UNLa. Stack: React, Bootstrap.

name: E-Commerce Web
description: CRUD web page that lets you register stores, add products and make orders on those products. Depending on your role you can manage those orders. Frontend: Thymeleaf, Bootstrap. Backend: Spring, MySQL.

name: BTree View
description: Desktop App based on C, GTK 3 and Glade. It helps you build and visualize binary trees, make use of various arrangement methods. Also includes AVL tree auto-balancing.

name: Simple Text Editor
description: Text editor with basic functions: open files from a folder tree, modify and save files to disk. Also includes settings like font size and family. Made with Java and Swing.
